name: CrowdFundAfrica
bio: CrowdFundAfrica is a new crowdfunding platform designed to support African innovators, entrepreneurs, and social causes. We aim to empower projects across the continent through secure, accessible, and affordable funding solutions.

recommendedFundraisers.name: Help Save the Rainforest
recommendedFundraisers.description: Join us in protecting the Amazon.

recommendedFundraisers.name: Support Local Families
recommendedFundraisers.description: Donate to help families in need.
